question: [Calm] English: Determine area and perimeter for the polygon passing through (123, 89), (71, 98), (68, 153), (69, 48), (124, 193).

qas.question: [Calm] English: Determine area and perimeter for the polygon passing through (123, 89), (71, 98), (68, 153), (69, 48), (124, 193).
